http://www.foxnews.com/world/2014/11/29/islamic-state-group-extremists-launch-new-assault-on-syrian-border-town-kobani/?intcmp=latestnews ‘They are attacking from four sides’: Activists say ISIS moves to Kobani from Turkey BEIRUT – The Islamic State group launched an attack Saturday on the Syrian border town of Kobani from Turkey, a Kurdish official and activists said, although Turkey denied that the fighters had used its territory for the raid.
